Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the SH-SY5Y cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Expression and promoter transactivation of p53 were increased for the variant NM_004562.3:c.1252C>T.
Expression and promoter transactivation of p53 were increased for the variant NM_004562.3:c.1321C>T.
Expression and promoter transactivation of p53 were increased for the variant NM_004562.3:c.482A>G.
Expression and promoter transactivation of p53 were increased for the variant NM_004562.3:c.766C>T.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were performed using multiple independent biological samples.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type parkin cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test and Newman-Keuls multiple comparison test for one-way ANOVA were used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: p53 expression and promoter transactivation levels similar to those in wild-type cells.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Increased p53 expression and promoter transactivation levels compared to wild-type cells.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Parkin mutations abolished binding to the p53 promoter for the variant NM_004562.3:c.1252C>T.
Parkin mutations abolished binding to the p53 promoter for the variant NM_004562.3:c.1321C>T.
Parkin mutations abolished binding to the p53 promoter for the variant NM_004562.3:c.482A>G.
Parkin mutations abolished binding to the p53 promoter for the variant NM_004562.3:c.766C>T.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were performed using multiple independent biological samples.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type parkin cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test and Newman-Keuls multiple comparison test for one-way ANOVA were used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Binding to the p53 promoter similar to that in wild-type cells.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Reduced or abolished binding to the p53 promoter compared to wild-type cells.
